results.name: Mario and Sonic at the Olmpic Winter games
Tatsunoko Vs. Capcom: Cross Generation of Heroes
Five Nights At Withered Freddy's Beta
Five Nights At Alfredo's Insecurity Breach

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: A CPU released in the last few years
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-2100 3.10 GHz or similar AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960, 2GB of Memory or similar AMD GPU
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: The Disk Space capacity will change the moment the game transitions from an Early Access Phase to another. The menus and the overall UI in the game don't require a mouse but only a keyboard/controller.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-2100 3.10 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU with 6 GB of Memory or similar AMD GPU
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: The Disk Space capacity will change the moment the game transitions from an Early Access Phase to another. The menus and the overall UI in the game don't require a mouse but only a keyboard/controller.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 700 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires SDL2

Minimum:

  • Processor: 700 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
